definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Muddy grass and tiny gray mounds of melting snow.
sentences.chinese: 草上粘滿泥污，唯唯一的灰色小雪堆正在溶化。

sentences.english: Rivers and lakes might dry up in some places, and glaciers might melt.
sentences.chinese: 某些地方的河川跟湖泊可能幹涸，冰河也可能溶化。

sentences.english: I think the best way to achieve perfectly uniform gooey deliciousness is to nuke it.
sentences.chinese: 若是要均勻的溶化棉花糖，最好的方法就是微波爐了。

sentences.english: Water-adding ratio is very large, melting is rapid and service life is long.
sentences.chinese: 兌水比例超大，溶化快速，使用壽命長。

sentences.english: Or they use plastic tarp to cover the ice so it does not melt so quickly.
sentences.chinese: 或是用塑膠布蓋住冰塊使冰塊可以不要這麼快溶化。

sentences.english: Dissolve the tablet in warm water.
sentences.chinese: 把藥片放進溫水中溶化。

sentences.english: In a small saucepan over low heat, melt peanut butter and butter and dissolve sugar.
sentences.chinese: 在一個小鍋裏低溫溶化花生醬和黃油。

sentences.english: Melting of land-based ice is responsible for the rest.
sentences.chinese: 陸地上冰塊的溶化則是另一原因。

sentences.english: The pleasant tasting soft tablets dissolve almost instantly in the mouth. Temporarily relieves the symptoms of involuntary urination (common bed-wetting) in children.
sentences.chinese: 良好的口味在嘴裏迅速溶化，緩解兒童的遺尿症狀。

sentences.english: Dissolution of primary wall appears at the neck of sterigma.
sentences.chinese: 擔孢子與擔子的小梗連接處出現初生壁溶化現象。

sentences.english: Melt butter in a 12-inch nonstick skillet over medium heat.
sentences.chinese: 在12英寸的平底鍋中溶化黃油，用中等溫度。

sentences.english: Traditional butter cookies that melt in your mouth.
sentences.chinese: 傳統香濃黃油曲奇，入口即溶化。

sentences.english: Colic tablets are very soft and dissolve almost instantly under the tongue.
sentences.chinese: 腸絞痛小片是相當軟的在舌頭上迅速溶化的小片。

sentences.english: Please dissolve the pill in water before taking it.
sentences.chinese: 服前請將藥丸放在水中溶化。

sentences.english: Melt yak butter in a black clay pan, then add the slices of matsutake.
sentences.chinese: 用黑陶土鍋溶化酥油，放上切好的松茸生片。

definition: to melt/to thaw/to dissolve/to blend into/to combine/to fuse
to spread out after being diluted or melted/to dissolve into a liquid
to freeze/to solidify/to congeal/fig. with rapt attention
